work.name: Nationwide Insurance
work.summary: Placed on a team supporting both data solutions for internal teams and analysis for top-level market performance. My internship allowed me to fulfill 15+ data requests from internal teams (dashboard creation, wrangling/cleaning, etc.) and lead an analysis on the commerical auto business.

education.institution: The Ohio State University, Columbus, Ohio

awards.title: Eagle Scout
awards.summary: The most prestigious award given by BSA, Eagle Scout requires years of climbing through the ranks of Scouting, mulitiple leadership positions, and a service project organized by the scout. Check it out on the projects tab above!
